directions: Whisk first 5 ingredients to blend in 13x9x2-inch glass dish, season with pepper. Add steak and turn to coat. Marinate steak up to 2 hours at room temperature or cover and refrigerate up to 1 day, turning steak occasionally.

Preheat broiler. Remove steak from marinade. Broil steak to desired doneness, about 4 minutes per side for medium-rare. Transfer steak to platter. Thinly slice steak across grain on diagonal and serve.
title: Marinated Flank Steak
